entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
